flavorText: A mimic need only touch a being to learn its shape, but touching usually leads to mauling and messily eating.

foreignData.flavorText: Ein Nachäffer muss ein anderes Wesen nur berühren, um dessen Gestalt zu lernen, doch die Berührung führt meist dazu, dass er es schwer verletzt und dann unschön auffrisst.
foreignData.name: Nachthimmel-Nachäffer
foreignData.text: Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch spielst, der sowohl weiß als auch schwarz ist, wird der Nachthimmel-Nachäffer 4/4 und erhält Flugfähigkeit (beides bis zum Ende des Zuges).

foreignData.flavorText: Un mímico sólo necesita tocar a un ser para tomar su forma, pero tocar normalmente lleva a la tentación de comer.
foreignData.name: Mímico cielo nocturno
foreignData.text: Siempre que juegues un hechizo que sea blanco y negro, el Mímico cielo nocturno se convierte en 4/4 y gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Il suffit à un mimique de toucher un être pour connaître sa forme, mais cela se termine généralement par un éventrement et un festin peu ragoûtant.
foreignData.name: Mimique du ciel nocturne
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous jouez un sort qui est à la fois blanc et noir, le Mimique du ciel nocturne devient 4/4 et acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: A un mimic basta toccare un essere per apprenderne la forma, ma il toccare si trasforma spesso in malmenare e mangiare disordinatamente.
foreignData.name: Mimic Notturno
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta giochi una magia bianca e nera, il Mimic Notturno diventa 4/4 e ha volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: ミミックが姿かたちを覚えるには触れるだけでいいが、大抵は触れた上で噛み殺し食い散らかすことになる。
foreignData.name: 夜空のミミック
foreignData.text: あなたが白であり黒である呪文をプレイするたび、夜空のミミックはターン終了時まで４/４になるとともに飛行を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 多相の戦士

foreignData.flavorText: A um mímico basta apenas tocar um outro ser para tomar sua forma, mas esse toque geralmente leva a pancadarias e a uma comilança desordenada.
foreignData.name: Mímico da Noite
foreignData.text: Toda vez que você joga uma mágica que é branca e preta, Mímico da Noite torna-se 4/4 e ganha voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Чтобы познать чужую форму, подражателю достаточно лишь одного прикосновения, но за этим, как правило, следует нанесение увечий и спешное пожирание.
foreignData.name: Подражатель Ночного Неба
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание, которое одновременно является и белым и черным, Подражатель Ночного Неба становится 4/4 и получает Полет до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 拟态妖不需碰触他物便可模仿其形状，但在碰触之后通常会是虐杀与狼藉饱餐。
foreignData.name: 夜空拟态妖
foreignData.text: 每当你使用一个含白黑双色的咒语时，夜空拟态妖成为4/4且获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

name: Nightsky Mimic
originalText: Whenever you play a spell that's both white and black, Nightsky Mimic becomes 4/4 and gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: Any other abilities the Mimic may have gained are not affected.
The ability triggers whenever you cast a spell that’s both of its listed colors. It doesn’t matter whether that spell also happens to be any other colors.

If you cast a spell that’s the two appropriate colors for the second time in a turn, the ability triggers again. The Mimic will once again become the power and toughness stated in its ability, which could overwrite power- and toughness-setting effects that have been applied to it in the meantime.

The effect from the ability overwrites other effects that set power and/or toughness if and only if those effects existed before the ability resolved. It will not overwrite effects that modify power or toughness (whether from a static ability, counters, or a resolved spell or ability), nor will it overwrite effects that set power and toughness which come into existence after the ability resolves. Effects that switch the creature’s power and toughness are always applied after any other power or toughness changing effects, including this one, regardless of the order in which they are created.

text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both white and black, Nightsky Mimic has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn and gains flying until end of turn.
